trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Get-HotFix
trans-unit.target: Get-HotFix

trans-unit.source: Get-HotFix
trans-unit.target: Get-HotFix

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Gets the hotfixes that have been applied to the local and remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 获取已应用于本地和远程计算机的修补程序。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Default (Default)
trans-unit.target: 默认值 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Hotfix** cmdlet gets hotfixes (also called updates) that have been installed on either the local computer (or on specified remote computers) by Windows Update, Microsoft Update, or Windows Server Update Services; the cmdlet also gets hotfixes or updates that have been installed manually by users.
trans-unit.target: **Get-hotfix** cmdlet 获取 （也称为更新） 通过 Windows Update、 Microsoft Update 或 Windows Server Update Services 在本地计算机上 （或在指定的远程计算机上） 已安装的修补程序，该 cmdlet 还将获取修补程序或由用户的手动安装的更新。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get all hotfixes on the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 获取本地计算机上的所有修补程序

trans-unit.source: This command gets all hotfixes on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取本地计算机上的所有修补程序。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Get all hotfixes on multiple computers that start with a search string
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 获取搜索字符串开头的多台计算机上的所有修补程序

trans-unit.source: This command gets all hotfixes on the Server01 and Server02 computers that have a description that begins with Security.
trans-unit.target: 此命令获取所有修补程序都有说明开头安全 Server01 和 Server02 计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Create a text file that contain the computer names that are missing a security update
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 创建包含缺少安全更新的计算机名称的文本文件

trans-unit.source: The commands in this example create a text file listing the names of computers that are missing a security update.
trans-unit.target: 此示例中的命令创建一个文本文件，其中列出缺少安全更新的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The commands use the **Get-Hotfix** cmdlet to get the KB957095 security update on all of the computers whose names are listed in the Servers.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 该命令可使用 **Get-hotfix** cmdlet 来在 Servers.txt 文件中获取所有其名称列的计算机上的 KB957095 安全更新。

trans-unit.source: If a computer does not have the update, the Add-Content cmdlet writes the computer name in the Missing-KB953631.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 如果计算机没有更新，则 Add-Content cmdlet 会将该计算机名称写入 Missing-KB953631.txt 文件。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Get the most recent hotfix on the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 4︰ 在本地计算机上获取最新修补程序

trans-unit.source: This command gets the most recent hotfix on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取计算机上的最新修补程序。

trans-unit.source: It gets the hotfixes, sorts them by the value of the InstalledOn property, and then it uses array notation to select the last item in the array.
trans-unit.target: 它将获取修补程序，按 InstalledOn 属性值对其进行排序，然后使用数组表示法来选择数组中的最后一项。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Specifies a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定远程计算机。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: Type the NetBIOS name, an Internet Protocol (IP) address, or a fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 键入 NetBIOS 名称、 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址或远程计算机完全限定的域名 (FQDN)。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不依赖于 Windows PowerShell 远程处理。

trans-unit.source: You can use the *ComputerName* parameter of this cmdlet even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 *ComputerName* 此 cmdlet，即使您的计算机未配置为运行远程命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as User01 or Domain01\User01, or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如 User01 或 Domain01\User01，或输入 **PSCredential** 对象，例如由 Get-credential cmdlet 生成。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则将提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: -Description
trans-unit.target: -Description

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hotfix descriptions that this cmdlet gets.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 将获取修补程序说明。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: The default is all hotfixes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为计算机上的所有修补程序。

trans-unit.source: -Id
trans-unit.target: -Id

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hotfix IDs that this cmdlet gets.
trans-unit.target: 指定此 cmdlet 将获取的 Id 的修补程序。

trans-unit.source: The default is all hotfixes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为计算机上的所有修补程序。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.ManagementObject#root\CIMV2\Win32_QuickFixEngineering
trans-unit.target: System.Management.ManagementObject#root\CIMV2\Win32_QuickFixEngineering

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet returns objects that represent the hotfixes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将返回这些对象表示在计算机上的修补程序。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet uses the Win32_QuickFixEngineering WMI class, which represents small system-wide updates of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 使用 Win32_QuickFixEngineering WMI 类，该类表示操作系统的系统范围小更新。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, this class returns only the updates supplied by Microsoft Windows Installer, Windows Update, Microsoft Update, or Windows Server Update Services.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows Vista 开始，此类返回仅由 Microsoft Windows 安装程序、 Windows Update、 Microsoft Update 或 Windows Server Update Services 提供的更新。

trans-unit.source: It does not include updates that are supplied by Component Based Servicing (CBS), or other non-hotfix programs or apps.
trans-unit.target: 它不包括由基于组件的服务 (CBS) 或者其他非修补程序或应用提供的更新。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Win32_QuickFixEngineeringhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145071 class topic in the Microsoft .NET Framework SDK at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145071.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145071 在 Microsoft.NET Framework SDK 中的 Win32_ QuickFixEngineeringhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=145071 类主题。

trans-unit.source: The output of this cmdlet might be different on different operating systems.
trans-unit.target: 在不同操作系统上，此 cmdlet 的输出可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Win32_QuickFixEngineering
